headline: A Look At Teledyne Technologies (TDY) Valuation After New Low Noise Amplifier Launch
summary: Teledyne Technologies (TDY) has drawn fresh investor attention after Teledyne HiRel Semiconductors introduced the TDLNA0840EP, an ultra low power, wideband low noise amplifier designed for demanding aerospace, defense, and battery constrained RF systems. See our latest analysis for Teledyne Technologies. The launch of the TDLNA0840EP comes as Teledyne Technologies' share price has recorded a 35.82% 90 day share price return and a 36.19% 1 year total shareholder return, pointing to strong...
